verses.name: Judges 5:16
verses.text: Why abodest thou among the sheepfolds, to hear the bleatings of the flocks? For the divisions of Reuben there were great searchings of heart.

verses.name: Judges 5:17
verses.text: Gilead abode beyond Jordan: and why did Dan remain in ships? Asher continued on the sea shore, and abode in his breaches.

verses.name: Judges 5:18
verses.text: Zebulun and Naphtali were a people that jeoparded their lives unto the death in the high places of the field.

verses.name: Judges 5:19
verses.text: The kings came and fought, then fought the kings of Canaan in Taanach by the waters of Megiddo; they took no gain of money.
